name: Only Cassette Coloring !
description:
People wants beautiful mixtapes. You can make beautiful cassettes. Help them in this small and relaxing puzzle game !

This game has been made in a few hours for the two week super rare mixtape jam 1

Musics credits

Here are the wonderful creators of the musics used in the game :

Monkey Warhol - Boots & Pants (Instrumental Mix)

Timecrawler 82 - Palms and Seagulls

Timecrawler 82 -Mt. Fuji

The Fish Who Saved The Planet - Akkurat

The Fish Who Saved The Planet - The Spontaneous Elk Reunion

Airglow - Blueshift

Airglow - Electrifying Landscape
